ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Mistmoore question....
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, it s time for me to come out and voice that tribunal is THE bard server. I have yet to enter a zone with less than 4 bards. Doesn t matter what time it is
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, it's time for me to come out and voice that tribunal is THE bard server.

I have yet to enter a zone with less than 4 bards. Doesn't matter what time
it is or what zone I go to, everywhere I look I'm surrounded by VERY green
bards in full blubicite.

This doesn't bother me in and of itself, other than the fact that I know I'm
competing with tons of bards to get the nice drops I want so badly. (MM
drums, lambent quest components, etc) What does bother me is that a large
percentage of these bards are ultra twinked and don't know what they are
doing. I actually met a bard that didn't know how to twist songs at level 20
!

Anyway seeing as how there are so many bards I often find myself grouped
with another bard and I start wondering about song selection. Many of the
bards I'm with are still playing bellows in thier late 20s and early 30s. I
find this odd because I haven't memmed the song since level 23. I was
wondering when the rest of you removed bellows from the list of songs yu
regularly mem.

Draelon Stormsong
bard of the tribunal
(3 bubs from tracking)

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2000 11:08 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoore question....


From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>

> MM drums on tribunal are generally trade only (greedy caster bastards) but
> the one person who was willing to sell was asking 3k p. Naturally I
> declined.

Most drums on Prexus used to go from 1K to 1.5K. It's used to be unusual to
get over 2K for them. On the other hand with all the bard twinks running
around these days, there are probably plenty of bards with 50th level
characters who wouldn't mind at all dropping 3K on some MM drums so they can
run faster. Heck, most of my best trades came from 50th level characters
twinking their other character :).

Taneran
